#summary List of features in FridgeScript v0.1.0b.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
This should provide a list of all features found in the 0.1.0b version of FridgeScript, corresponding to revision 37 of the source in the repository. 


= Details =

v0.1.0b supports:
  * all of the mathematical operators
  * all of the logical operators except xor
  * all branches and loops
  * all of the assignment operators except the bitwise ones and the binary shifts
